Connor Norby homered and drove in three runs
Xavier Edwards and Nick Fortes had two hits each
Pre-Game Insights: Marlins manager Skip Schumaker said they were looking to bounce back from a 16-2 loss the previous day
The Marlins were busy Saturday, adding four new players to the roster
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies manager Rob Thomson said Aaron Nola's command of the baseball was the issue, and he paid for it
Marlins manager Skip Schumaker praised the team's performance, especially with all the moving parts in the clubhouse
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Marlins padded their lead with a three-run seventh against former starter Taijuan Walker
Philadelphia's Kyle Schwarber hit a tying sacrifice fly in the third inning for his 93rd RBI of the season
The Marlins selected the contract of catcher Aramis Garcia from Triple-A Lehigh Valley and designated RHP Nick Nelson for assignment
Others: RHP Seth Johnson will make his major league debut when he starts the series finale for the Phillies on Sunday
The Marlins have not announced a starter but Schumaker said RHP Edward Cabrera could get the nod
